welcome.default: Welcome to Microsoft Beijing Toastmaster Club
welcome.Chinese: 欢迎来到微软头马俱乐部

time.Chinese: 时间：每周三晚19:00~21:00 (每月最后一次为中文会议，其他时间为英文会议)

venue.default: Venue: Room Dongzhimen, F1, Microsoft Build 1, Danling St. Zhongguancun West Zone Haidian Dist.
venue.Chinese: 地点：海淀区丹棱街5号微软大厦1号楼1层东直门会议室

mission.default: We provide a supportive and positive learning experience in which members are empowered to develop communication and leadership skills, resulting in greater self-confidence and personal growth.
mission.Chinese: 我们为会员提供友好和充满激励的学习体验，使会员可以快速主动地透过不同的练习，提高沟通能力和领导技巧，从而提升自信和促进个人成长。

privacy_statement.default: The meeting will be recorded by officer team & may be published on the Internet. Please contact officer team if you got any concern on privacy; we will cut related parts.
privacy_statement.Chinese: 会议组织者会对本次会议进行录像，并可能会把录像发布到互联网上。如果你对隐私问题有顾虑，请联系组织者；我们会将与你有关的部分从录像中删除。

manner_1.default: Taboos: No topics about religion, race, politics and sex during the meeting.
manner_1.Chinese: 禁忌： 请不要在会议中讨论关于宗教、种族、政治和性方面的话题。

manner_2.default: Mobile: Please turn mobile phone to silent mode.
manner_2.Chinese: 手机： 请将手机调至静音模式。

manner_3.default: Language: No private talk during the meeting.
manner_3.Chinese: 语言： 请不要在会议中私下交流。

manner_4.default: Support: Please keep applauding when the speakers walk up and down the stage. Don't forget to shake hands when you turn the floor over to others
manner_4.Chinese: 支持： 在演讲者上下台过程中请鼓掌表示支持。在台上交接时请不要忘记和交接人握手。

join_1.default: Step 1: Inform our VPM asap, and attend at least three meetings of this Club as a guest.
join_1.Chinese: 第一步： 将入会意愿告知俱乐部VPM，并以访客身份参加至少三次活动。

join_2.default: Step 2: Participate in at least two Table Topics Sessions to deliver qualified impromptu speeches.
join_2.Chinese: 第二步： 至少参加两次即兴演讲环节并进行达到标准的即兴演讲。

join_3.default: Step 3: Contact and make an appointment with our VPM Bonnie Wang ( WeChat: Bonniewyy ).
join_3.Chinese: 第三步： 与VPM Bonnie Wang联系并预约入会事宜。(微信： Bonniewyy)
